ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "ApprovalProcess" ), or( text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( SBU__c ) = "ATR", text( SBU__c ) = "BGA"), or( CONTAINS(Account.Name , "Unknown" ), CONTAINS(Account.Name , "UNKNOWN" ), CONTAINS(Account.Name , "VARIOUS" ), CONTAINS(Account.Name , "Various" ) ), text( Account.Type ) <> "Distributor", text( CBT_Tier_2__c ) <> "Sales Ops Adj", text( CBT_Tier_2__c ) <> "HTSI", text( CBT_Team_Tier_3__c ) <> "COM DEV" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Various and Unknown Accounts cannot be on an Opportunity
